segments.text: Excuse me . Is this the right way to the museum ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid you're going in the opposite direction . Go back the way you came , and take the second turn on the left . The museum is straight ahead , right in front of you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will it take me long to get there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it's about fifteen minutes ' walk .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You may take a No . 34 bus . And the subway can also take you there .
segments.speaker: S2
